mean_cn: n. 活动性，灵活性，迁移率，机动性
mean_en: the ability to move or travel around easily; the ability to move easily from one place, social class, or job to another
sentence: These houses have greater mobility, so you can move it at any time.
sentence_trans: 这些房子灵活性更强，所以你随时都可以搬家。
word_etyma: mob动 ＋ ility名词后缀 → mobility能动性
